name: CRAPPY ZOMBIE GAME
description: Dismember Zombies - Manual Reloading System - Dual Wielding - Axe Throwing Zombies - Pistol Zombies - Full Left-handed Support
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-5960X Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce® GTX 980 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1.5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: Controls are a bit difficult but it's very fun. There's a few weapons to mess around with and the rules of the game change every round, stuff like boxing only to unlimited throwing axes. The dismemberment and gore is what really makes this game interesting.
